name: LikeLoveHate
overview: React to media with Like, Love, or Hate
description: Adds Like, Love, and Hate reaction buttons to media item detail pages using Material Design icons.

versions.changelog:
This release focuses on stability and polish. It fixes critical sync issues and improves the configuration page experience.
Key Changes:

Config Page:
Wipe All: Replaced the browser confirm dialog with a clearer Click again to confirm button.
Export: Fixed issues with downloading the JSON export file.
UI:
High-performance injection logic ensures buttons appear instantly on page load.
Perfect synchronization between OSD and Header buttons.
